news.title: Netanyahu accuses Starmer of siding with Hamas
news.summary: The UK, France and Canada condemned the expanded Israeli military operation in Gaza this week.

news.title: Prince of Wales hails Sir David Attenborough ‘inspiration’ for new wildlife show
news.summary: The Prince of Wales says his new series on rangers follows in the nature broadcaster's footsteps.

news.title: Man in Norway wakes to find huge container ship in garden
news.summary: Johan Helberg says he was "quite astonished" to look out of his window and see the vessel.

news.title: The Papers: 'Chagos surrender' and 'Shipshape Kate'
news.summary: The fallout from the PM's controversial Chagos Islands deal features prominently in Friday's papers.

news.title: What not to miss at Radio 1's Big Weekend 2025
news.summary: Four stages, 100 acts. Not sure where to start? Greg James, Jack Saunders and Sian Eleri have you covered.

news.title: U2: 'We want to make the sound of the future'
news.summary: In an exclusive interview, the band talk about their first album since 2017's Songs of Innocence.

news.title: US says Sudan used chemical weapons in war as it issues new sanctions
news.summary: The state department is imposing new sanctions on the country's government because of the findings.

news.title: Sum 41 music agent among those killed in San Diego plane crash
news.summary: Federal officials say all six people aboard the small plane are presumed dead.

news.title: Title, Trent and transfers - Slot reflects on season
news.summary: In a wide-ranging interview with the BBC, Liverpool boss Arne Slot says excuses are "for teams that don't win the league".

news.title: Arsenal's Williamson savours 'full circle' moment
news.summary: Speaking to BBC Sport's Jo Currie, Arsenal captain Leah Williamson says to be leading her side out against Barcelona in the a Champions League final is a "full circle" moment as she was a mascot for their previous final in 2007.
